title: The Canterville ghost
brief_description: A delightful animated adaptation of a tale by Oscar Wilde, it tells the story of a ghost who tries to scare the new inhabitants from his house. Instead of being scared, the Otis family find the ghost’s ghoulish games quite entertaining. The ghost becomes quite discouraged until the family’s caring daughter, Virginia, takes the time to discover the reasons for his hauntings.
